message_snippet: You have received a new order from Jenna Lee totaling 89.90 SGD.
Hi, could you confirm when my order 10234 will be shipped to Tampines?
We are 20 orders behind on packing, mainly yesterday night’s flash sale.
Can I approve 2 hours overtime for the warehouse team to clear the backlog?
Your weekly Stripe payout of 4,239.12 SGD has been initiated to your bank account.
Shipments to Australia may experience a 1 to 2 day delay due to customs congestion.
Yesterday’s Meta ads achieved ROAS 3.1, top campaign was Vitamin C launch ad set.
I ordered the Hydrating Toner but received the Brightening Serum instead.
SKU SKN-VC-30 is below threshold, current on hand 18 units.
Attached is the revised quotation for 2k and 5k units of custom mailer boxes.
I can introduce you to my friend who invests in DTC beauty brands next week.
I’ve updated the investor deck with the latest MRR and CAC numbers, please review.
Are you free for family dinner this Sunday evening?
Can we update the refund macro to mention digital gift cards as non refundable?
I’ve replied to the VIP customer asking for an exception on the refund window.
A dispute has been opened for transaction TXN-99201 for 59.90 SGD.
Shortlisted 5 nano influencers for the acne care bundle, see the Notion link.
Sharing our proposal for Q1 campaigns and content calendar for AuroraSkin.
Several high performing keywords are limited by daily budget in SG market.
What is the latest date we need the UGC clips for the March sale?
Can I update the delivery address for order 10240 to my office instead?
One carton from supplier arrived with 12 bottles leaking, need instructions.
The current pallet jack is failing, requesting approval to purchase a new one.
Your welcome flow generated 3,129 SGD in the last 7 days, top email is Step 3.
Need approval for courier invoice INV-5521 before Friday cut off.
I’ve updated the GST working file with January’s marketplace sales.
Your monthly membership will renew on 5 February, cancel 3 days before to avoid charges.
Customer wants 120 gift sets for corporate event, asks about bulk discount.
Several customers still ask about shipping despite the updated FAQ.
You received a 3 star rating on Lazada for Brightening Serum, comment mentions slow delivery.
Cart abandonment increased to 78 percent in the last 24 hours on mobile devices.
Your subscription for Upsell Plus will renew in 3 days for 29 USD.
VIP customer with lifetime value above 3k is requesting exception on return window.
We specialise in scaling DTC beauty brands with creative testing and performance ads.
We may need to open a Saturday morning shift if orders continue at this pace.
You have 37 unreconciled bank statement lines pending in Xero.
Variant B with urgency wording has 6 percent higher open rate so far.
Please cancel my monthly skincare subscription after this month’s box.
Today is scheduled for cycle count of aisle B bins 12 to 20.
Thinking of a quick weekend trip, you keen to join?
We should finalise MRR, CAC and LTV numbers before the investor call.
A new version of your Dawn theme is available with performance improvements.
Zendesk is running slowly, some tickets are not loading for agents.
You are invited to join the upcoming Beauty Super Brand Day campaign.
Reminder that quarterly GST filing is due on the 15th, need final sales figures.
Your main newsletter list grew by 217 subscribers in January.
Two COD orders from Malaysia failed delivery twice, requesting instructions.
After using your night cream I had redness, can you advise and possibly refund?
New racking for small parcels is in place, picking path can be optimised.
Your business account ending 1023 fell below the configured threshold today.
